step_1.label: Opening browser Devtools
step_1.step_description_1: You can do this by pressing the F12 key, or by right clicking on the page and selecting "Inspect" or "Inspect element" Make sure to do this on
step_1.step_description_2: and in the same browser you are currently using!

step_3.label: Copying cookies
step_3.step_description: by double clicking on the value in the "Value"column, and insert them in their appropiate fields on the bottom of the page.

step_completed.description: Done! You can close this window or navigate back to the previous steps.
